Value: Roots Sustainable Agricultural Technologies Ltd. operates as an agriculture technology company in Israel. It focuses on developing, producing, and commercializing precision agriculture technologies that address difficult weather conditions, enhance crop yields, and provide water for irrigation. The company offers drip and temperature control (D-RZTO) system, root zone temperature optimization (RZTO) system, and irrigation by condensation (IBC)system. Roots Sustainable Agricultural Technologies Ltd. was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Kfar Vitkin, Israel.
